title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.255 - Trade discount
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.255 - Trade discount

State Regulations

The discount allowed to a class of customers on a list
price before consideration of credit terms; as a rule, invoice prices are
recorded in the books of account net after deduction of trade and quantity
discounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.255

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
